ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 741
ygData.msgSnippet: Message: 2 Date: Sun, 20 Apr 2003 00:53:27 -0000 From: Enie  Subject: Stein of Moggok Quest First of all, I d like to wish everyone a
ygData.messageBody:
Message: 2
Date: Sun, 20 Apr 2003 00:53:27 -0000
From: "Enie" <dawn_marie@...>
Subject: Stein of Moggok Quest

First of all, I'd like to wish everyone a Happy Easter.

Have a question. I did the Stein Quest twice today. Cast Illusion:DE
on my Lvl 14 Erudite Enchanter, and cast Alliance on Clurg. I conned
Clurg as Amiable both times. Both times I said "What special book",
he replied, and I gave him the compodium. Then he said something
like "You must have worked hard to get my book, I am indebted to you.
I don't like being indebted, so take this as payment". He didn't give
me anything; no PP, no stein. I petitioned the GM. Does anyone have a
clue as to what is going on?



________________________________________________________________________

i do know they have been doing something to the illusions recently. heard that you can't use illusion wolf to buy from the brownies anymore, only druid wolfform works. that will disappoint alot of enchanters I know, the distilled mana spells are on those brownies. Makes it 10 times harder to get them.
I would petition until you get a response, sounds like you did everything right, the racial illusions are supposed to be working correctly, it's just the other types of illusions that aren't supposed to be giving faction changes.
